title: Japa is a relationship with Krishna   Soulful Japa
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Maharaj

segments.text: I said Japa is not merely a process. Japa for a beginner, it is a process. Because he has to
align his mind and senses all those things towards what right way of Japa. But eventually Japa is a
relationship with Krishna. In two hours you're sitting and chanting, it's a relationship with
Krishna. Just like you go and sit near your loved ones and spend time. The same way we spend time
talking to Krishna because today spiritually we do not know any other spiritual vocabulary.
We are not awakened. So only one vocabulary we know today which the Guru has given us. What is

it? Hare Krishna, Hare Krishna, Krishna Krishna, Hare Hare, Hare Rama, Hare Rama, Rama Rama, Hare Hare, Hare Krishna, Hare Krishna, Krishna Krishna, Hare Hare, Hare Rama, Hare Rama, Rama Rama, Hare Hare.
This is our talk with Krishna. Sound incarnation. God says that's good enough. Just go on chanting.
Just go on chanting. Chanting and hearing, chanting and hearing, chanting and hearing.
